programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2025
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Moving Kitchen (M) Ep391
programme.desc: Tuesday "iWalker" has been upgraded and changed the name into "iWalker-Moving Kitchen". James and the pretty chef, Rachel will move to different province with the mobile kitchen which costs more than 2 million NTD, and introduce to the audience the unique taste of the province.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Girls VS Gangsters
programme.desc: A bachelorette weekend spins hilariously out of control when three friends wake up naked on a beach and find themselves handcuffed to a mysterious briefcase, with local gangsters in pursuit. They must regain memories of what happened that weekend if they hope to go back home safely!

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover’s death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile “Hand of God” to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the ‘Hand of God’?

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: A Simple Life
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is based on a true story. Ah Tao works as a maid for Roger’s family for four generations. After they emigrated, she stays only to work for Roger, but is forced to retire and move into an elderly home after she suffered a stroke. Since then, Roger becomes her caregiver as Ah Tao starts adapting to a new life.

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: A coming-of-age tale about a group of close friends from high school, college and eventually reaching adulthood through the 1990s and 2000s. They meet again at a friend's wedding in 2014 and recall their romantic past through memories.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons – a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: Agent Wen is assigned to work undercover for a Southeast Asian military arm dealer to find some munitions and to destroy them. When he finally finds the munitions though, he is attacked by unknown gangsters and has to team up with his partner to recover the munitions so as to prevent a disaster from occurring.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: Ah Fatt and Tin Ba are the top disciples of the mahjong maestro. After winning the first “King of Mahjong” title, Fatt retires to lead a peaceful life with his daughter. Although Ba subsequently wins the next ten titles, he cannot get over the fact that Fatt beats him and challenges Fatt for a final showdown in the first Mahjong World Championship.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: Hong Kong action cinema is famous for its real kung fu moves performed by a group called “Kung Fu Stuntmen”. This docu-film pays tribute to the generations of kung fu stuntmen, with the crew spending over two years digging archives and interviewing many talents, including the most prominent masters like Jackie Chan, Donnie Yen and Sammo Hung.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kit’s master, Debo.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the other’s mole.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel “84, Charing Cross Road”. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the minister’s conspiracy…

programme.title: The Trough
programme.desc: Yu Chau is a cop who has gone very deeply undercover within the triads. When he accidentally kills one of his pals in an operation, he runs off into the wild to lick his wounds. Upon his return, he teams up with fellow officers Jim and Jackie to catch a triad Boss, only to unveil collusion with government officials at the highest level.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome life’s challenges.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score…

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: An innocent young girl named Zuo Lan attempts to commit suicide after she was betrayed by her boyfriend. However, she is saved by a gangster boss called Zui Ge. In order to exact her revenge, Zuo Lan joins force with Zui Ge and becomes a top mobster…

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chef’s delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Siu Man is divorced by her husband due to her fear of intimacy. After that, she wants to restart her life by taking over her father’s restaurant. Siu Man hires a new chef with unique culinary philosophy that revitalizes her. Tired of the shackles she placed on herself, Siu Man embarks on a journey of self-discovery and sexual liberation.

programme.title: Blind War
programme.desc: Former SWAT captain Dong Gu suffers traumatic visual loss during a failed mission for which he is forced to take responsibility. He manages to get over and adapt to the situation with his daughter’s company, until his nemesis appears and puts his daughter in danger. Despite being blind, Dong Gu must fight to save his daughter.

programme.title: Aberdeen
programme.desc: The Cheng family embodies a microcosm of Hong Kong, with its contradictions between tradition and modernity, superstition and materialism, family and individual. The movie reveals troubled characters dealing with their own issues in the city, from the eldest, Taoist priest patriarch Dong; to the youngest, the bullied elementary schooler Chloe.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Spirit of the Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot…

programme.title: Return of the Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: The legendary hero Wu Sung is sent to a prison in Meng province after murdering his adulterous sister-in-law and her lover. While in prison, the officer Shih En spares Wu the humiliating baton punishment. Owing Shih a favour, Wu decides to help Shih get his restaurant back at all costs when it was forcefully taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich man’s party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chief’s granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back…

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: Governor Yan is killed and his guard Fan identifies Kou as the assassin by his signature weapon, a dart. Kou is listed as a wanted man when he enters the city, but managed to escape arrest with the help of the innkeeper’s daughter. At the same time, Fan is attacked by a bandit who pretends to be Kou. What are the secret plots behind these attacks?

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fête. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant’s confusion, threatening the couple’s union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: Hong Kong 73
programme.desc: In 1973, the Hong Kong Heng Seng Index hit extraordinary peaks and people from all walks of life go stock market crazy. Meanwhile, Hong Kong's social problems build up without anyone paying attention to what are actually happening to the crazy lives of people, in this mad city that many call home...

programme.title: To Kill a Mastermind
programme.desc: A ruthless crime syndicate, Qi Sha clan, which is controlled by seven chiefs is terrorizing China. The Imperial Court orders Minister Yang to bring them down by sending undercovers to the clan and disintegrating them from the inside. As more internal conflicts occur, will the masterminds of the clan find out who are the spys?

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: Duel For Gold
programme.desc: Six swordsmen, including two sisters and their husbands, a ranger and a security man, are trying to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House, not knowing that one of them is actually an undercover hero. In their quest, they have to double-cross and outwit one another...

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Wei Chun is a cocky young man sentenced to jail for killing a man in a fight. One day, Wei Chun picks a fight with a seemingly defenseless old man who completely thrashes him! The old man turns out to be the master of monkey style kung fu and as they become friends, he gives Wei Chun half of a medallion that would direct him to hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Perfumed Arrow
programme.desc: A charming Huangmei Opera title, this is the story of Fei E, a General’s daughter who grows up fooling everyone that she is a boy, including her two closest schoolmates. When she has to choose one of them to marry, how will Fei E tell them that she is a girl? To complicate matters, a girl who Fei E saves one day only wants to be married to her!

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A dedicated chief constable nicknamed “The Invincible Fist” is chasing after a band of bandits near a village one day and encounters an innocent blind girl. He quickly falls in love with her, but finds out she is the daughter of a vicious bandit. Will he kill the father of his lover?

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: My Young Auntie
programme.desc: An elderly landowner marries young Dai Nan to keep his inheritance away from his unscrupulous nephew before he dies. When Dai Nan brings along the deed to meet his other nephew, a series of amusing incidents happen with this “young” auntie, the nephew and his son. Kara Hui won Best Actress in the first Hong Kong Film Awards for her role as Dai Nan.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Disco Bumpkins
programme.desc: This musical comedy is about how a young man Fen, along with his buddy Hamburger, finds love and success in the advertising world.

programme.title: The Mighty One
programme.desc: Lung seeks five volumes of a renowned Kung Fu manual to gain invincibility. When he believes a martial arts school master possesses the volumes, he kills him and his daughter but leaves behind a young brother and sister. Years later, Lung loses two volumes and starts another bloody hunt but each attempt is interrupted by two mysterious warriors...

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: The 36th Chamber of Shaolin
programme.desc: Gordon Liu plays an anti-Manchu rebel who escapes to the Shaolin Temple and learns what it truly takes to become a martial arts master by challenging the 35 Shaolin Kung Fu chambers, eventually creating the 36th chamber himself.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: Crippled Avengers
programme.desc: Chu Twin becomes crazy after his son’s arms were chopped off. For no reason, he harms four people causing them various disabilities. The four disabled form a band to learn Kung Fu from a master, in order to take revenge on Chu Twin.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the most widely read Ching Dynasty novel, this touching love story has proven a challenge to many filmmakers, and it is acclaimed as the most successful one. A sumptuous feature that took three years of planning and production, it was a hugely popular and critiqued hit which stands out as a classic combination of both 18th century literature and 1960s moviemaking.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui’s husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: The Black Falcon
programme.desc: Jenny Hu and veteran co-star Margaret Tu Chuan join longtime0020idol Paul Chang Chung in a battle against the notorious Black Falcon crime mob in Singapore. Together they have to face forgery, fire, and even poisoned needles to stop the mob.

programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes… Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevan’s successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.title: Cop Out
programme.desc: Bruce Willis and 30 Rock's Tracy Morgan star as two longtime NYPD partners on the trail of a stolen, rare, mint-condition baseball card in the first major studio project from cult independent filmmaker Kevin Smith (Clerks, Chasing Amy). Willis plays the veteran detective whose missing collectible is his only hope to pay for his daughter's upcoming wedding, and Morgan is his "partner-against-crime." The two cops find themselves tangling with a merciless, memorabilia-obsessed gangster, rescuing a Mexican beauty with the key to millions in laundered drug money, and everything else that's not in a day's work for the detective duo.

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Oscar® winner Robert De Niro (Raging Bull, Silver Linings Playbook) and Oscar® nominee Sylvester Stallone (the Rocky films, The Expendables) play Billy “The Kid” McDonnen and Henry “Razor” Sharp, two local Pittsburgh fighters whose fierce rivalry put them in the national spotlight. Each had scored a victory against the other during their heyday, but in 1983, on the eve of their decisive third match, Razor suddenly announced his retirement, refusing to explain why but effectively delivering a knock-out punch to both their careers. Thirty years later, boxing promoter Dante Slate Jr., seeing big dollar signs, makes them an offer they can’t refuse: to re-enter the ring and settle the score once and for all.

programme.title: Speed Racer
programme.desc: Fearlessly hurtling down the track, careening around, over and through the competition in his thundering Mach 5, Speed Racer was born to race cars. But when Speed turns down a lucrative offer from Royalton Industries, he not only infuriates the company's maniacal owner but uncovers a terrible secret – some of the biggest races are being fixed by a handful of ruthless moguls! The only way for Speed to save his family's business and the sport he loves is to beat Royalton at his own game. With the support of his family and his loyal girlfriend, Trixie, Speed teams with his one-time rival – the mysterious Racer X – to win the race that took his brother, Rex Racer's, life: the death-defying, cross-country rally known as The Crucible.

programme.desc: Luke and Roger are just another couple of college guys trying to lose their virginity. But when Luke sees something unusual, he begins to suspect that the girls on campus aren't exactly… human.

programme.title: Her Deadly Boyfriend
programme.desc: After breaking up with her perfect-on-paper boyfriend, Sadie is swept off her feet by the rebellious bad boy Gavin. But soon, she discovers dating a bad boy isn’t just exciting... it’s dangerous.

programme.title: Lock, Stock & Two Smoking Barrels
programme.desc: Four nice, but petty criminals find themselves heavily in debt to a murderous London gangster after a crooked card game. To cover their debts and literally save their skins, they decide to rob a bunch of thugs who have just robbed a group of pot growers.

programme.title: Sliver
programme.desc: A literary agent's life seems to take a turn for the better when she moves into a new apartment and develops a romance but as the history of the building and its occupants unfolds, she is plunged into a terrifying nightmare of high-tech voyeurism and murder.

programme.title: Kickboxer
programme.desc: After kickboxing champ Eric Sloane (Dennis Alexio) is crippled in the ring by the evil Tong Po, Eric's younger brother, Kurt (Jean Claude Van Damme), seeks vengeance.

programme.title: Deadly Dormitory
programme.desc: When a University student refuses to sleep with her professor in exchange for good grades, she’s in danger of being killed to keep her quiet, and her mother must drop everything to save her.

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Once-incarcerated Marcus Cowans is trying to turn over a new leaf with the support of his loving family. Upon discovering that one of his brothers may have been involved in a horrific crime, Marcus grapples with the limits of brotherhood and loyalty.

programme.title: In The Line Of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent seeks to redeem himself by saving the life of his country's highest elected official, even if it means sacrificing his own.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: When retired CIA agent finds himself the target of a deadly assassin he reaches out to his old work friends in a bid to learn the truth while staying out of the mysterious enemy's clutches.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S10) Ep10
programme.desc: Snared - Lessons are learned and personal battles are fought by Alaskans enduring winter's descent. Chip and Agnes hailstone dig their boat out of the ice and Ricko Dewilde takes his two daughters on a hunt.

programme.title: The Hunt (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Hide and Seek follows tigers, harpy eagles, chimpanzees, army ants and other predators as they rise to the challenge of hunting within the forest - a dense, confusing, three-dimensional world.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: The Bank Card - Hannah Fry takes a look at the bank card, the digital key to accessing cash, and finds out how its extraordinary innovations have some surprising and sinister origins.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers (S2) Ep1
programme.desc: Zambezi - Follow the journey of the mighty Zambezi - Africa's wildest river. It floods across endless plains, fuelling the migration of 30,000 wildebeest, turning villages into islands accessible only by boat.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II (S2) Ep6
programme.desc: Our Frozen Planet - Our frozen planet is changing. In this final episode we meet the scientists dedicating their lives to understanding what these changes mean, not just for animals and people who live there, but for the planet as a whole.

programme.title: Life Below Zero (S10) Ep10

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Yorkshire - In Yorkshire, Kate heads to the fishing village of Staithes which was once home to one of Yorkshire's largest fishing fleets, and the explorer Captain Cook.

programme.title: The Secret Genius of Modern Life (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: The Food Delivery App - Hannah Fry tucks into the tech behind food delivery apps, which are now used by 24 million people in the UK. Hannah finds out how pizza made us fall in love with the internet.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn (S1) Ep4
programme.desc: A look at the Port Building, a stunning, gravity-defying office complex building that appears to hover over a 19th-century fire station, and uses a borehole energy system that makes it one of the most energy efficient buildings in Europe.

programme.title: Food Factory (S4) Ep7
programme.desc: In this episode, tortilla chips are produced by the thousand, bite-size coffee cakes are created, and vegan mint double chocolate cookies are made. Plus, a look at microwaveable popcorn.

programme.title: Food Factory (S4) Ep8
programme.desc: This episode looks at the production of Triple "C" cheesecake, animal crackers, crispy sweet potato fries, and the tofu that gets a gourmet overhaul.

programme.title: Earth's Great Rivers (S2) Ep2
programme.desc: Danube - From crystal-clear waterfalls to baby turtles the size of a thumbnail - explore the magical wonders of the Danube. Branching out across Europe, its tributaries gather water from 19 countries.

programme.title: Turkey with Simon Reeve (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Gallipoli to the Syrian Border - Simon visits Istanbul and the beaches and crystal clear waters of the Aegean Sea before ending up at the war-torn border with Syria.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle (S9) Ep7
programme.desc: Arizona - A disabled retiree turned into a modern-day nomad travels across the United States and uses a renovated military transport vehicle for her journey.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green (S3) Ep2
programme.desc: Kenya - Robson heads to the east coast of Kenya, where the Indian Ocean offers some of the best game fishing in the world.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn - An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Summer - Summer in Africa is a season of extremes, it separates the weak from the strong. It tests the survival instincts of cheetahs, lions, geckos, turtles and many more species as they search for food and water in the extreme heat of summer.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the season’s fury.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep7
programme.desc: Colors & Patterns - Get a front-row seat to nature’s most spectacular fashion show. Admire the luxuriant blond manes of golden snub-nose monkeys, stunning pink flamingo feathers brought on by an all-crustacean diet, and the meaningful markings of gemsboks and cheetahs.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 Ep1
programme.desc: A Wild Education - Welcome baby orangutan Topan, an orphan in need of a surrogate mom. Watch her learning journey in nursery school while her fellow students move through junior, senior, and wild-immersion schools. Meanwhile, 16-year-old Kasper preps for graduation.

programme.title: Becoming Orangutan 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lean on Me - Observe blossoming friendships and interspecies bonds in nursery school, and peek inside a bromance among junior-school buds Valentino, Yutris and Madara. See distractible Beni lean into his love of food and get a beating from a more-senior pupil.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades - Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europe’s birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn - An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rules of the Game - Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists’ cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweed—all following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Ones - Learn why bigger is definitely better for these alphas. Go ringside for a gorilla wrestling match, stay away from pushy moose antlers, steer clear of long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and marvel at a megashark’s stereo sniffer.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the season’s fury.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep9
programme.desc: Power - Power-up with alphas who use might to subdue enemies. Marvel when sea lions throw their weight around to win a mate, Cape buffalo deliver knockout punches, Canada geese hit hard with their wings, and lionesses rule the savannah with an iron paw.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep10
programme.desc: Ugly - Confront alphas with faces only a mother could love. Inspect warthogs’ lumpy armour, giant African bullfrogs’ outsized jumping and biting skills, wild turkeys’ sharp beaks and razorlike spurs, and Nile crocodiles’ crushingly powerful jaws.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Mafia Island - Uncharted Paradise - Just off the Tanzanian coastline lies an island Utopia. Its diverse habitats provide homes for a multitude of creatures living above the water and below. And when the time is right, a mysterious being rises from the deep to feed in the rich waters. This is Mafia Island.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Secret Life of Bugs & Butterflies - At first glance, the tropical forests of Australia seem empty and still. But look closer and they are packed with life. Few places in the country contain such a high diversity of insects as here. From the canopy to the forest floor, insects cram into every space – and they must fight to survive. In this great battle for life, insects have adopted extraordinary survival strategies: jumping spiders disguise themselves as ants; ants use their larvae as glue-guns to build elaborate tree-top camps; what look like leaves are in fact stick-insects.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn - An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Super Sight - Vision – it’s how ninety-five percent of animals interpret the world. Every species on Earth is a chapter in the fascinating story of sight. This episode follows that story from blurry beginnigs to mind-blowing hexnocular vision.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Super Powers - See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a super-power just to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life in Dark Water - In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn - An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Risk and Reward - The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep11
programme.desc: Loners - Sidle up to lone wolf alphas who’d rather go solo. Take a glacial stroll alongside a Galápagos tortoise; dance with venomous European adders; watch a face-tearing battle between Lacerta lizards; and gasp at leopard seals’ amazing stealth attacks.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep12
programme.desc: Chatty/Communicative - Connect with Earth’s most talkative species. Meet capuchin monkeys, who definitely don’t take a vow of silence; endure Eurasian river otters’ chilling screams; face angry fruit bats’ loud complaints; and explore orcas’ human-scale speech systems.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Lake Malawi - In one of Africa’s greatest lakes, rock and water set the stage for evolution’s most magnificent display. This episode tells the story of this remarkable example of evolution in action, as well as showing how the lake provides for a range of life, both above and below the surface.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep7
programme.desc: The Waterhole - While many think of coastlines and deserts when they think of Australia, there are other secret pockets of paradise that are home to some of the most intriguing and iconic of its animals: the waterholes. The freshwater wetlands and waterholes in the tropical far North of the country are among the most diverse ecosystems, hosting an extraordinary array of birds, insects, fish and freshwater crocodiles.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Age of Independence - The south-eastern coast of New Zealand are some of the richest fishing grounds in the world – the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults. Young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Risk and Reward - The drought is finally over, but traversing the forest for food is still a gamble. See some leaders take the risk, leaving home territories undefended to feast on a cicada boom. When they return, trespassers are ready for a fight.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Fires of Don Goyo - Volcanic folklore is reflected in Mexican history. One of their ancient legends tells the story of the Aztec warrior Popocatépetl - a giant active volcano - who erupts to wake his sleeping princess Iztaccíhuatl, a neighbouring extinct ice capped volcano.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 Ep3
programme.desc: A Place Like Hell - In Indonesia we find regions where the air is so toxic that it’s 40 times above human safe levels and sulphuric acid vents from the ground in dense yellowish clouds. Elsewhere, small volcanoes are so active, they are said to erupt every 15 minutes!

programme.desc: In Dunstable, John and his wife Helen demolish an old, dilapidated house and in its place build a million-pound, high-tech, accessible glass pavilion, complete with wildlife garden.

programme.desc: Donal Skehan makes a confetti cake and steak frites as anytime treats.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep11
programme.desc: My Fair Foosa - To bring peace to his kingdom, King Julien “civilizes” a Foosa.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep12
programme.desc: Diapers Are The New Black - King Julien discovers diapers and brings style to his lemur subjects, igniting a fashion war.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep13
programme.desc: Rescue - Cleo and the rest go on a rescue mission to crime-ridden Hykosis City, which leads to a devastating confrontation with Octavian.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep14
programme.desc: Mihos - Cleo encounters an adorable alien creature and brings him home, along with his eggs. Wait, if he’s a “him,” how does he have eggs? Aliens are weird.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep11
programme.desc: Lucky And The Christmas Spirit - When Miradero's Christmas presents are delayed and snow isn't falling, Lucky and her friends decide it's up to them to bring the Christmas spirit to Miradero.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep12
programme.desc: Lucky And The Deadly Blizzard - When a sudden blizzard hits Miradero, Lucky and Maricela must work together to save the town.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep21
programme.desc: Weekend at Diamonds / Brancheption - Guy creates a new invention, the Farty Party/When Branch is trapped in a dream by a mysterious critter called the Dream Sucker, he must find a way to escape

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep16
programme.desc: Shiny Leaf/Roundy - Leaf freaks out when he finds a blemish on his butt before a body building competition and Twig tries desperately to snap him out of his existential crisis. / Berry gets jealous when Rocksy starts spending all of her time with a marble, and tries various attempts to make the marble "disappear."

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep21
programme.desc: Spell - As he tries to restore the magic spell that will protect San Lorenzo, Puss accidentally brings Artephius's macramé owl shop to life.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep43
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Abandoned Artifact Of The Absentee Aliens - After George and Harold learn the truth about their mission, Dupe Licitous enlists the entire crew in a quest to repair a rogue satellite.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep44
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Hazardous Hysteria Of The Hangry Hypnosinger - Everybody on the spaceship has been cryogenically frozen for three months — everyone, that is, except Krupp, who's wide awake and happily in charge.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep41
programme.desc: Gruff Around The Edges - When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep42
programme.desc: Midnight Scrum - When Viggo puts a bounty on Hiccup's head, every Dragon Hunter in the world is after capturing Hiccup, so Toothless and the Riders must rescue him.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep16
programme.desc: P.U. - Boss Baby must "de-stink" Simmons after a misfire of Stinkless Serum, and Tim & Danny try to upgrade their small- scale taxi business

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep15
programme.desc: Curse of the Monkey King - Po and the Kids take a shortcut to the boat bound for the Forbidden City, and are waylaid by a tricky monkey. Zhizhu informs Mayor Li of some distressing sounds coming from the Wellspring.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep16
programme.desc: A Game of Fists - When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.desc: Weekend at Diamonds / Brancheption - Guy creates a new invention, the Farty Party/When Branch is trapped in a dream by a mysterious critter called the Dream Sucker, he must find a way to escape

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep16
programme.desc: A Game of Fists - When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.desc: Weekend at Diamonds / Brancheption - Guy creates a new invention, the Farty Party/When Branch is trapped in a dream by a mysterious critter called the Dream Sucker, he must find a way to escape

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep16
programme.desc: Shiny Leaf/Roundy - Leaf freaks out when he finds a blemish on his butt before a body building competition and Twig tries desperately to snap him out of his existential crisis. / Berry gets jealous when Rocksy starts spending all of her time with a marble, and tries various attempts to make the marble "disappear."

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep21
programme.desc: Spell - As he tries to restore the magic spell that will protect San Lorenzo, Puss accidentally brings Artephius's macramé owl shop to life.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep29
programme.desc: The Case Of The Silent Parrot - The Pirate Captain is very worried. Scurvy the parrot isn't saying a word. Without him navigating they won't be able to go treasure hunting anymore! Why is Scurvy so quiet? Is there something wrong? Or is he hiding something? It's up to Noddy to investigate!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Ninjas - The Ninjas are preparing for an acrobatics show. But after Pat-Pat decorates them with glitter they don't turn up for their rehearsal. Noddy investigates, looking for the Ninjas, but only finds sticky things have gone missing round Toyland - Pat-Pat's glue-stick, the Naughticorns' sticky tape, the Builders' sticky putty. Noddy works out that the glitter made the Ninjas non sticky, so they borrowed sticky things to try and make themselves sticky again. Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep31
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Suitcase - Pat-Pat is packing for a sleepover at the Palace when her suitcase goes missing. Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the Pockets took the suitcase in order to get Pat-Pat's sleepy pillow. They wanted to keep the pillow because it reminds them of Pat-Pat and they would miss her while she was at the sleepover. Noddy finds the Pockets and the suitcase in the dark, just in time for the sleepover. Queen Sparklewings invites everyone to the sleepover. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Two Parties - The Naughticorns are having a party and naturally they want everyone to come. Trouble is, so are the Pirates. But when no one turns up to either party, Noddy investigates: Why has no one come to either party?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep3
programme.desc: Huffty Loses His Voice - Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa Finds A Voice - Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep5
programme.desc: Zebby's Snack Time - Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place… but everywhere they try is just too noisy… I wonder why that could be?!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep6
programme.desc: Finding Noisy - Raa Raa gets carried away when collecting fun noisy objects in the jungle with his friends. Raa Raa wants to keep everything he finds for himself, but soon discovers that his collection isn't much fun with nobody to share it with.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep29
programme.desc: Homesick Tin Top - Tin Top just can't master corners no matter how hard he tries. The other cars try to help him to no avail… until Roary hits on a brilliant plan.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep30
programme.desc: Save Our Tree - Mr Carburettor is planning on cutting down Flash's tree. What can be done to save the poor rabbit's home?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep31
programme.desc: New Juice - Conrod is visiting Silver Hatch to try out some new bio fuel. But Big Chris fears something is wrong with it after he comes out in spots after sampling a smoothie made from the same produce. What or who could be at fault?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep32
programme.desc: Fb For Football - The cars are having a football tournament down at the beach. FB learns that if he relaxes, his natural footballing skills will shine through.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep15
programme.desc: 2500 Candles For Ra / It's A Mad Mad Mad Underworld - 2500 Candles for Ra Upset that no one remembered his birthday, Ra goes to hang out with the mummies at the Deedstown museum. It's a Mad, Mad, Mad Underworld When Casper finds Cappy's old treasure map, he promises to help the pirate find his lost fortune.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep16
programme.desc: Curse Of The Sandwich / A Real Little Monster - Curse of the Sandwich After Ra accidentally bites into Thatch's sandwich, he becomes convinced that he's turning into a vampire. Real Little Monster When Norman the bully comes after Jimmy, Casper helps his human friend hide in the one place he knows Norman won't look—Scare School.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevin’s “jokes.” Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his “comedian’s disease.” Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep33
programme.desc: Escape From Krinkle's - Boss has an opportunity to get his old job back at Baby Corp;but to get the interview;he’ll need the playgroup babies to help him escape Marsha Krinkle’s super-safe Bubbeezee playroom. Tim nearly misses Kabob Day at school.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep68
programme.desc: Lost And Foundlings - When the Duchess comes to town declaring that she is ready to start a family, the Orphans have a competition to see who will be the lucky adoptee

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep16
programme.desc: Meet the Peppy / Party Crash Course - When Peppy invites Branch to go on a Swag Stag hunt, Branch is nervous and invents a tall tale that he must keep up with/DJ Suki confesses that she's nervous to throw a party so Poppy suggests she join the Party Crash Course

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep42
programme.desc: Who Arted? - King Julien is crazy with jealousy and throws out the kingdom's art after he is upstaged by Mort who is now the town's hottest new artist

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep16
programme.desc: Lucky And The Risky Rescue - When a Tuckapaw boy is unfairly arrested, Lucky and her friends plan to break him out of jail.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep16
programme.desc: Bahama Drama - When Odlulu uses the Bubble Key to raise a sunken ship in the Bahamas, the Wanderers and Wizard Doubloon must take to the high-seas to catch this bubble-wielding buccaneer before she makes away with the ship's booty.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep5
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Pancake Party - Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car. Even worse, Ted Glen's amazing Pancake Machine has run out of mix so Sara won't be able to run the race unless Pat can get to Greendale on time... But Pat gets waylaid by Alf's cows and the pancake mix ends up all over the road. Pat hurries back to Pencaster but Michael now only has butter and flour so Pat has to go and get eggs from Nisha and even some milk from Rosie the goat! With the race about to start, Pat arrives just in time with all the ingredients necessary for Ted to make Sara a fresh pancake. SDS Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.title: Olivia Ep31
programme.desc: Olivia Becomes A Vet - After a trip to the vet with Julian's pet lizard Bernie, Olivia is inspired to become a vet herself. She imagines herself curing all kinds of wild animals, and back home she goes to work on the only two patients available: her pets! Her treatments for Edwin and Perry turn out to be a bit messier than she expected.

programme.title: Olivia Ep32
programme.desc: Olivia Becomes A Chef - It's Mother's birthday, and Olivia's planning something really special: a surprise dinner, with all red food. Imagining she's a famous chef with Dad and Ian as her helpers, the real challenge is keeping mum out of the kitchen while they prepare her special meal.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep31
programme.desc: New Juice - Conrod is visiting Silver Hatch to try out some new bio fuel. But Big Chris fears something is wrong with it after he comes out in spots after sampling a smoothie made from the same produce. What or who could be at fault?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep32
programme.desc: Fb For Football - The cars are having a football tournament down at the beach. FB learns that if he relaxes, his natural footballing skills will shine through.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep30
programme.desc: Farewell, General Sherwood / Zoom Boomer - After a memorial for a famous tree that has fallen, Archibald discovers that Sage has never cried and vows to help his brother get in touch with his emotions. / When Archibald wins the chance be shot from a cannon at the circus, he has no idea everyone in town is vying to be his plus one.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep17
programme.desc: The Good Surprise / Nightmare On Eep Street - When Ugga's new surprise attack fails, and she comes home in a bad mood, Thunk tries to cure it by finding a happy surprise for his mom/ Eep stays up all night to see the mysterious and rare Night Mare (a horse with a rainbow mane) when she's teased for thinking they're not real.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep16
programme.desc: Lucky And The Risky Rescue - When a Tuckapaw boy is unfairly arrested, Lucky and her friends plan to break him out of jail.

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep16
programme.desc: Boy Story / Puzzle, Puzzle, Toil and Trouble - Lotta must infiltrate the Bloogey's treehouse by going undercover and pretending to be a boy. Fredo throws a block-wide puzzle hunt.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep16
programme.desc: Buster Move / Gills! - Smoove Move is embarrassed when his nerdy brother comes to visit.// Skidmark causes a panic when he hunts a snail-eating goldfish at a fancy party.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep16
programme.desc: Divewings - When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep30
programme.desc: Farewell, General Sherwood / Zoom Boomer - After a memorial for a famous tree that has fallen, Archibald discovers that Sage has never cried and vows to help his brother get in touch with his emotions. / When Archibald wins the chance be shot from a cannon at the circus, he has no idea everyone in town is vying to be his plus one.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep16
programme.desc: Shiny Leaf/Roundy - Leaf freaks out when he finds a blemish on his butt before a body building competition and Twig tries desperately to snap him out of his existential crisis. / Berry gets jealous when Rocksy starts spending all of her time with a marble, and tries various attempts to make the marble "disappear."

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep22
programme.desc: Scimitar - While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep33
programme.desc: The Case Of The Messed-Up Painting - Queen Sparklewings has done a beautiful painting to use in her Story-Time afternoon. But then Coco and Noddy discover it ruined! Coco thinks that Bling must have done it but she protests her innocence. Noddy investigates: who messed up the Queen's painting - and can he get it fixed again in time? Keep investigating, Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep34
programme.desc: The Case Of The Deltoid's Challenge - "Deltoid accepts the Ninja's challenge to run around the loop-theloop. But when he fails on his first attempt, he feels ready to give up in despair. Noddy investigates: How can he help Deltoid do his challenge?"

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep35
programme.desc: The Case Of The Knights On Patrol - The Knights set off on their patrol but are delayed by someone playing tricks on them. Noddy investigates: who's playing tricks on the Knights? He soon finds them in Fable Forest, waylaid by yet another cheeky trick. Noddy will have to find the culprit before the Knights end up in serious trouble!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep36
programme.desc: The Case Of The Delayed Repairs - The railway tracks are being repaired all over Toyland by the Builders, so Farmer Tom, Tractor and a trailer are running a replacement service. But the repairs take longer than expected when the Builders' tools go missing. Noddy investigates, and finds that Cloppycorn loved the trailer rides so much that he hid the biolders' tools in a basket that Pat-Pat had asked him to take to the other Naughticorns. Cloppycorn apologies, the tracks are swiftly repaired, and Cloppycorn happily rides around the farm on the trailer. Well done Noddy !

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep7
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo's Jungle Drums - Raa Raa has found an infectious beat, and soon all the other animals in the jungle are joining in… except for Ooo Ooo, who just can't get the beat right. How can they find a way for all the friends to play together?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep8
programme.desc: Topsy's Musical Stones - Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong… especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep210

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Kite - While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Nap - Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep and they each offer their own unique way to do it!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Welcome to Blue's Bistro - Welcome to Blue's Bistro - a very fancy restaurant! While playing Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to eat, we help Josh take our friends' orders and skidoo to Farmer Goat's farm to retrieve fresh vegetables!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep529
programme.desc: Paw Patrol: Mighty Pups - When their latest scheme goes awry, Mayor Humdinger and his nephew Harold accidentally divert a meteor towards Adventure Bay. The meteor's golden energy grants the PAW Patrol superpowers! The heroic MIGHTY PUPS are on a roll to super-save the day!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Donut Panic / I Scream - Rammy's tips on focus and meditation come in handy when Sir Steel's Replicator causes havoc in the Central Forest with giant donuts. // When Kai overexerts his Water Power on an ice cream machine, the machine turns into a rampaging Ice-Bot!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp - Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Paddington And The Metal Detector - Paddington is given a Metal detector by Mr. Gruber. Beep beep beep what has Paddington found now?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Banana - Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Best in Flow - Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep154
programme.desc: No Panic ! - Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep143
programme.desc: The Surprise - They decide to organise a surprise party on the hill. The organisation gets out of hand when Bubu's invitation cards fly away, Ron gets distracted in writing a heartfelt poem and Christopher tries to resist to eat the strawberry pie he baked

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Bicycle - Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Ukulele - Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! Ron and Froga do everything they can to stop Anna from finding out, finally they need to confess their mistake.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep132
programme.desc: Bubu's Robot - Bubu is understandably thrilled when he discovers his old toy robot that he converts into the FIX-IT-UP 5000. Anna, Froga, and Christopher are so impressed with his new fixer-upper robot, Bubu begins to think his friends like his robot more than him!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Froga's Choice - Froga can't decide which boots to wear for today's group photo with her friends. Anna, Ron, and Bubu try to help her decide, but it makes her decision-making more difficult!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebecca’s paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Clock and Dance / Barbapileup - The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S06 Ep608
programme.desc: The Puppy Chase! - When a big bubble floats away with Gabby's new puppy, she'll team up with Blaze and AJ to get him back.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Recycling Power! - When Axle City is visited by a littering raccoon, it's up to Blaze to save the day as a Super Recycling Truck! He cleans up the town and rescues his friends - just in time for a final showdown with the Litter Critter!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Pups Save the Diving Bell / Pups Save the Beavers - While the Turbots are deep sea diving, their diving bell ends up stuck! PAW Patrol to the rescue! // A storm washes away a beaver's dam, so he chomps all the wood at Farmer Yumi's! The PAW Patrol arrives to help rebuild his home!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Pups and the Big Freeze / Pups Save a Basketball Game - A winter ice storm causes trouble all over Adventure Bay. The PAW Patrol races to the rescue! // Mayor Goodway challenges Mayor Humdinger’s Basketball team to a game. The pups pitch in and become the Adventure Bay All-Stars!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Deep Blue Boo Boo / Stuck Together - When the Robotons dump a load of plastic in the Crystal Lake, a raging lake monster appears and Rammy has to conquer his fear of water to save the day! // When Lola and Sir Steel become stuck together, they have no choice but to work as a team!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Deer Ball - Things get competitive when Sir Steel takes on the Deer Squad for the Deer Ball Cup - but who's bending the rules?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Paddington Plans a Party / Paddington Learns the Violin - Mr Brown has forgotten to get Mrs Brown a Birthday present, Paddington decides to hold a surprise party. // Judy does not like Violin lessons so hides from Ms Potts. Paddington takes up the challenge. Watch out ears!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Paddington Makes a Scrapbook / Paddington Digs a Tunnel to Peru - Paddington decides to make a scrapbook of memories and tries to include all his friends to show Aunt Lucy. // Paddington decides to dig a Tunnel through the centre of the earth to Peru but ends up in Mr. Curry's green house.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep243
programme.desc: School Camp - Peppa and her friends are going camping with Madame Gazelle. When it gets dark, they all sing a song around the campfire. When it is time for bed, Peppa and her friends get a little scared and all the children end up sleeping in Madame Gazelle’s tent

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep244
programme.desc: The Toy Cupboard - Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled – and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep245
programme.desc: Captain Daddy Pig - Peppa and her family borrow Grandpa Pig’s boat for a day on the river. Daddy Pig is the captain, Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are the crew. When the boat gets stuck in some long reeds. Daddy Pig has to use all his strength to push the boat free.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep246
programme.desc: The Quarrel - Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep626
programme.desc: The Three Guppeteers! - When a Gargoyle steals all the gifts and decorations for Countess Zooli's surprise party, the French villagers call in the Three Guppeteers. But will the swashbuckling girls be able to swipe back all the presents in time for la grande fête?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Blue's Snowy Day Surprise - There are SNOW many great things to do on a snowy day like today, but Blue's surprise may be the best! We'll play a wintry game of Blue's Clues to figure out what her surprise is.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Blue's Backyard Sports Spectacular - It's a Backyard Sports Spectacular! Coach Josh and friends are playing all the sports and getting ready for a soccer game! But Magenta isn't ready for the big game. We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Magenta feel ready to play!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Cecilia and the Magic Rubies / Under the Pirate Moon - Santi and crew go underwater to stop Escarlata la Pirata before she steals all the Magic Rubies from Giant Clam Reef! // It's a nighttime chase above and below the sea when Escarlata turns the moon into a fish.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Sea Dragon's Treasure - After Enrique nabs a Sea Dragon's golden egg, it's up to the good pirates to nab it back before things get out of control.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis - Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!
